content: space repeat from * around joining last st to first slip_stitch with a slip_stitch 108sts & 18 sl sts fasten_off and hide loose ends sleeves attach yarn beneath the sleeve hole on the bodice you will have 6 skipped stitches over the bottom and 8 chains to work through across the top 14sts you will also work a st into the sides where the top and bottom meet total 16sts round 1 ch1 work 16sts evenly around the hole bearing in mind the information above join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch 16sts round 2 ch1 half_double_crochet into the first st ch3 skip the next st *half_double_crochet into the next st ch3 skip the next st repeat from * around join 8sts & 8 ch3 spaces fasten_off and hide loose ends ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ i really hope you have enjoyed making this weebee dress please share your projects with us on the weebee appreciation society facebook page link on first page don t forget to add your project to ravelry and share photos and videos on instagram/tiktok etc using the tags on the first page ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
